p.s: In my opinion Shakespeare should still be taught in German English class because he is still relevant in our time.
He was ahead of its time when it comes to his literature because he discussed topics which everyone could relate to, and the way people 400 years later can still understand.
He brings to the point what it is to be human.
Added to that Shakespeare created 1700 words, which are partly still used till this day.
In his plays, poems and sonnets he talks or displays themes that will always be talked about no matter how old society gets.
Whoever published ShakespearesShakespeare's sonnets without his consent did a great job because it had a great impact in englishEnglish literature.
